FName.Chinese: 求生之路方式使用资源包

FDescription.English:
Use left and right mouse buttons to apply resource packs instead of E.

Left mouse = yourself
Right mouse = other players

<color=orange>[R4+]</color> You're able to hold down M2 and it will start applying to a receiver under your croshair if in range automatically

<#f00><u>/!\</u> Make sure to <color=orange><u>disable</u></color> the vanilla game setting <color=orange>Gameplay > Separate Use Keybinds</color> for this Feature to work!</color>
FDescription.Chinese:
使用鼠标左键和右键来应用资源包，而不是使用E键。

左键 = 自己
右键 = 其他玩家

<color=orange>[R4+]</color> 你可以按住鼠标右键，如果在范围内，它将自动开始应用到你准星下的接收器

<#f00><u>/!\</u> 请确保<color=orange><u>禁用</u></color>原版游戏设置<color=orange>游戏玩法 > 分开使用按键绑定</color>以使此功能生效！</color>
